Find your perfect fabric

 

PREMIUM POLYCOTTON
Do you want top-quality bedding that lasts for years and years? Polycotton is our premium option! Its blend of natural cotton and durable, colourfast polyester fibres doesn’t pill and it is treated with a Soft Touch application for a superior soft feel. The breathable fabric is cool against your skin, crease-resistant and machine washable.

 Premium quality
 Breathable
SHOP NOW
BEST VALUE MICROFIBRE POLYESTER
When you want bedding on a limited budget, microfibre polyester is the option for you. Its 100% polyester fibres are soft and feather light. Lightweight yet durable, it is also machine washable.
 
 Value for money
 Lightweight and durable
SHOP NOW
LUXURY PERCALE
Percale is the ultimate luxury! The higher the thread count of fabric, the softer the bedding. Percale has a thread count of at least 180 threads per square inch and is made of 100% cotton or a top-quality polycotton blend, so your bedding is guaranteed to be supersoft.

 Ultimate luxury
 Superior softness
SHOP NOW
NATURAL BAMBOO
Stay cool in summer and cosy in winter with our 100% natural Bamboo bedding. It’s hypoallergenic and antibacterial, so you’ll get a healthy night’s sleep without pesky allergies. It’s also crease resistant so you’ll save time and money on ironing.

 hypoallergenic & antibacterial
 Crease resistant
SHOP NOW

EASYBED FITTED SHEET/NIGHT FRILL
To simplify your life, we’ve developed a unique fitted sheet and night frill in one! Just slip the EasyBed over your mattress and you’ll have a perfect bottom sheet and night frill in place without having to lift the mattress at all.
